about_the_game:
Last Fantasy Hentai Jigsaw 2 explores even more deeply the tradition of the main game.
It tells a bit of the story of the young master after he married Yuki Natsume and became the current king.
You'll challenge Jigsaw puzzles and progress on the game will undressing the lychantrope character on backgrounds.

- 5 Jigsaw puzzles with Last Fantasy hentai lychantrope character.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not suitable for all ages or for viewing at work: Nudity or sexual content, Non-specific adult content
